title: #236/The Perspecta: John O'Neill + DC Hillier + Musical Guest Eden Atwood
description: Joining us today are John O'Neill and DC Hillier, hosts of the new mid-century modern podcast, The Perspecta.  Later, stick around for musical guest Eden Atwood, who will leave you … (sigh) … breathless.
content:encoded: Joining us today are John O'Neill and DC Hillier, hosts of the new mid-century modern podcast, The Perspecta.  Later, stick around for musical guest Eden Atwood, who will leave you … (sigh) … breathless.
